properties.name: project.version
properties.description: The current application version (should be extracted from Maven).

properties.name: database.location
properties.description: The relative path to the database folder.

properties.name: database.path
properties.description: The relative path to the database file.

properties.name: database.url
properties.description: The JDBC URL to the database.

properties.name: database.backup.number
properties.description: The maximum number of backups of the database can be saved at one time.

properties.name: database.backup.delay
properties.description: The minimum number of days between two database backups.

properties.name: database.update.backup.number
properties.description: The maximum number of backups of the database before an update can be saved at one time.

properties.name: sql.scripts.resources.location
properties.description: The relative path to the SQL resources folder.
